Text: Spending less on short trips, finally!
I’m not sure how I feel about the fare change.
Why does my daily route cost more now?
Confusing fares! Miss the old days.
Traveling from Nyamirambo to town is cheaper now.
This pricing is not fair for daily riders.
People seem angry online. Something’s off.
Why not just fix the buses first?
So far, it's okay. Let's see long-term.
The fare increased again? Not cool.
I love paying based on distance!
